Package curam.util.jmx

This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam JMX service.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CuramMBeanContext The execution context for Curam MBeans.
 

Class Summary
CuramJMXUtil A collection of useful methods to use when dealing with the JMX infrastructure.
CuramMBeanAbstract Superclass of all Curam MBeans.
CuramMBeanUtil MBean utility class which provides common statistic calculations.
NumericCounterStatistics Data structure with statistics for a numerical counter.
NumericCounterStatisticsAggregator A utility class that holds and aggregates statistics for a positive numeric counter.
 

Exception Summary
CuramJMXUtil.CallableException Exception thrown by the CuramJMXUtil.runAndRecord(java.util.concurrent.Callable, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) method.
 

Package curam.util.jmx Description

This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam JMX service.
